definition.value: a small compartment, open at one end.
any small enclosed area that confines comfortably.
a small snug place (as for hiding or storage).
to beat or pulse quickly and strongly.
a strong beat or pulse.
wicked; evil.
likely to be cruel or violent; fierce.
dangerously aggressive.
a piece of armor worn or carried on the arm to protect against blows from weapons.
a someone or something that gives protection.
to protect.
to cause to be snarled or tangled.
to wrap or twist together.
catlike, resembling a cat.
a corner of a room or a small area set off from a main room.
a secluded or sheltered place or part.
to fall down or in; give way.
to stop working or end suddenly; fail.
to suddenly lose strength or health because of disease or exhaustion.
a sudden falling down or in.
not orderly or neat.
out of control.
someone who always pries into other people's lives and affairs.
to close in or shut in with walls or a container.
to include inside or with.
to include along with something else in a package or envelope.
to cause to act.
to assist by providing forgotten words in theater, radio, and television.
done immediately and without pause.
being ready and quick to act.
an act that causes a strong feeling of anger because of its violence or cruelty.
to cause anger and shock in.
to cause to move suddenly.
to alarm suddenly; surprise.
showing too much interest in other people's activities.
a small piece that is the right size for one bite; bit.
of, like, or covered with tar.
to delay or be tardy or late in acting or doing
to linger in expectation
to abide or stay in or at a place
provided with or having a groove or grooves.
a person who reveals secrets or informs on others.
an unpleasant feeling of coldness.
make cold.
horrify or frighten.
gracefully thin.
make thinner.
a cut in an edge or object.
to cut a notch in something.
irritate; annoy.
not at all stylish; shabby or dull.
characteristic of causing pain or suffering.
